price: 40. Zodat wij de tovenaars kunnen volgen als zij de winnaars zullen zijn.”
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
